name: Lytix
long_description: Lytix is Datadog for LLMs. We give developers time, money and certainty when building with AI. Developers are using lytix to build custom evaluations, identify opportunities to save money, and optimize their KPIs. In 4 months we've gone live with 4 companies, and processed over 400k events. Sahil (CEO), worked on product analytics and built machine learning models at QuickBooks. Sid (CTO) was previously a lead engineer at Titan (YC S18) where he has directly contributed to a cybersecurity patent and done multiple large scale infrastructure migrations.
one_liner: DataDog for AI, build custom evaluations for end-to-end observability.
